Author: Elllliiiizzzaabeth
Text: I’ve been faking my weight and lying to doctors for 2ish years and honestly I’m always so terrified my lies will get exposed. Always feel so proud of my sneakiness afterwards tho or at least up until I realize I can’t even tell anyone about my success because I’ll literally sound insane lmao. Nothing screams “I have crippling anorexia” like taping ankle weights to your body and chugging a gallon of water while consistently assuring  your concerned friends and family that you’re completely fine and healthy 😎
